name: GetOrganizationMemberships
description:
Retrieve organization memberships and related details.

Use this tool to list the organization memberships for all users in an organization. You can also retrieve your organization's URI using this endpoint.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Token used to retrieve the next or previous set of results for paginated data.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: number_of_rows_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of rows to return in the response.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: filter_by_email
parameters.description: A specific email address to filter the organization memberships by. Only memberships associated with this email will be returned.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: filter_by_organization
parameters.description: Filter the results by organization. Provide the organization's unique identifier or name to retrieve specific memberships.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by organization

parameters.name: filter_by_user
parameters.description: Filter the results by a specific user. Provide the user's identifier to narrow the search.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by user

parameters.name: filter_by_role
parameters.description: Filter the results by role. Options: 'owner', 'admin', 'user'.

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by role

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by email address

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by organization

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by organization

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by user

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by user

parameters.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by role

value_schema.description: Indicates if the results should be filtered by role

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
